thread.title: Ruby Y. Hernandez
thread.title_full: Save On Energy reviewed by Ruby Y. Hernandez

author: Ruby Y. Hernandez
title: Ruby Y. Hernandez
text: The agent who helped me named Aaron did a superb job. She was nice. Gave me the best Voice of care. Had a great experience talking to her because she made all work smoothly. But her willingness to repeat things back with such polite way made me feel cared for to help me. Thank u so much. God Bless her.
